page.title: 06FAMILY LIFE IN THE 1980's
page.content: Families in Raunds and Hargrave are very much the same as any other family across the British Isles.They do hobbies, such as fishing, swimming, tennis and football, in their leisure time. In Raunds and Hargrave there are no leisure centres so we have to go to Rushden which is about five miles away or we go to Wellingborough which is about ten miles away.Some families like going to visit places of interest such as old houses or ruins of castles. Many families have pets such as cats, dogs, rabbits, goldfish or birds. These are kept for enjoyment for all the family. On week days many people go to work. Some go all over the country and they even work abroad in places like America, Saudi Arabia, Germany or many other far away countries.
